EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFederalIncomeTa.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFederalIncomeTa.description: Amount of federal income tax basis of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Number of Loans
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.description: Number of mortgage loans within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodicPayment.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Periodic Payment Terms, Balloon Payment to be Received
MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodicPayment.description: Amount of payment to be received at final maturity date for mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePrincipalAmount.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Principal Amount of Delinquent Loans
MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePrincipalAmount.description: Amount of principal due on delinquent mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

AccretionAmortizationOfDiscountsAndPremi.label: Accretion (Amortization) of Discounts and Premiums, Investments
AccretionAmortizationOfDiscountsAndPremi.description: The sum of the periodic adjustments of the differences between securities' face values and purchase prices that are charged against earnings. This is called accretion if the security was purchased at a discount and amortization if it was purchased at premium. As a noncash item, this element is an adjustment to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AccretionExpenseIncludingAssetRetirement.label: Accretion Expense, Including Asset Retirement Obligations
AccretionExpenseIncludingAssetRetirement.description: Amount of accretion expense, which includes, but is not limited to, accretion expense from asset retirement obligations, environmental remediation obligations, and other contingencies.

AccruedLiabilitiesAndOtherLiabilities.label: Accrued Liabilities and Other Liabilities
AccruedLiabilitiesAndOtherLiabilities.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid nor invoiced, and liabilities classified as other.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConv.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Convertible Debt with Conversion Feature
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConv.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from recognition of deferred taxes for convertible debt with a beneficial conversion feature.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOthe.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Other
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOthe.description: Amount of other increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStoc.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Stock Issued, Issuance Costs
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStoc.description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from direct costs associated with issuing stock. Includes, but is not limited to, legal and accounting fees and direct costs associated with stock issues under a shelf registration.

AdvancesToAffiliate.label: Advances to Affiliate
AdvancesToAffiliate.description: Long-Term advances receivable from a party that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. This does not include advances to clients.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, after Tax
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.description: Amount, after tax, of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesAdjustment.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Adjustments, Other
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesAdjustment.description: Amount of other addition (reduction) in allowance reserve for credit loss.

AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.label: Amortization of Debt Discount (Premium)
AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.description: Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAn.label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Options and Restrictive Stock Units
AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAn.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of stock options or restrictive stock units (RSUs).

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesGrossUnr.label: Available-for-sale Equity Securities, Gross Unrealized Gain
AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesGrossUnr.description: Amount of unrealized gain before deducting unrealized loss on investments in equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

AvailableForSaleSecurities.label: Available-for-sale Securities
AvailableForSaleSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAmortizedCost.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Amortized Cost Basis
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAmortizedCost.description: This item represents the cost of debt and equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments including accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesCurrent.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Current
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesCurrent.description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as trading securities nor held-to-maturity securities and intended be sold or mature one year or operating cycle, if longer.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecuriti.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Equity Securities
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecuriti.description: Amount of equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor as trading.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Gains
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.description: This item represents the gross profit realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashFDICInsuredAmount.label: Cash, FDIC Insured Amount
CashFDICInsuredAmount.description: The amount of cash deposited in financial institutions as of the balance sheet date that is insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccount.label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications (to) from Nonaccretable Difference
CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccount.description: Amount of reclassification (to) from nonaccretable difference (from) to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

CollateralizedFinancings.label: Collateralized Financings
CollateralizedFinancings.description: The value of the collateral (typically cash) that the entity receives in a financing transaction in exchange for securities lent. This item represents a liability in the financial statements of the lender of the securities.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Amount Converted
ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.description: "The value of the stock converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

ConvertibleDebt.label: Convertible Debt
ConvertibleDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

ConvertibleNotesPayable.label: Convertible Notes Payable
ConvertibleNotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a written promise to pay a note, initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, which can be exchanged for a specified amount of one or more securities (typically common stock), at the option of the issuer or the holder.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Gain (Loss)
DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Collateral Amount
DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount.description: Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

DebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities
DebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInt.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInt.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from recovery.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleChangeInPr.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Change in Present Value, Expense (Reversal)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleChangeInPr.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from change in present value of expected cash flows.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPastDue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Past Due
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPastDue.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), past due.

DeconsolidationGainOrLossAmount.label: Deconsolidation, Gain (Loss), Amount
DeconsolidationGainOrLossAmount.description: Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

DilutiveSecuritiesEffectOnBasicEarningsP.label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Dilutive Convertible Securities
DilutiveSecuritiesEffectOnBasicEarningsP.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of dilutive convertible securities excluding adjustments related to ESOP convertible preferred stock, stock options, and restrictive stock units.

Dividends.label: Dividends
Dividends.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

DividendsCommonStockStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Stock
DividendsCommonStockStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

DividendsPayableAmountPerShare.label: Dividends Payable, Amount Per Share
DividendsPayableAmountPerShare.description: The per share amount of a dividend declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

DividendsPreferredStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock
DividendsPreferredStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Allowance for Credit Loss at Acquisition Date
FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.label: Financing Receivable, Reclassification to Held-for-sale
FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.description: Amount of financing receivable reclassified to held-for-sale.

FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForSale.label: Financing Receivable, Transfer to Held-for-Sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Expense Reversal
FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForSale.description: Amount of expense reversal of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable transferred to held-for-sale classification.

GainLossOnSaleOfDebtInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Debt Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfDebtInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of debt securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Securities, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet.description: The net gain (loss) realized from the sale, exchange, redemption, or retirement of securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

GainOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain on Sale of Investments
GainOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A gain would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is greater than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Gain included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

IncentiveFeeExpense.label: Incentive Fee Expense
IncentiveFeeExpense.description: Amount of expense for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Accrued
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.description: The amount of estimated penalties and interest accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities and Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued expenses, and obligations classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInMarginDepositsOutstand.label: Increase (Decrease) in Margin Deposits Outstanding
IncreaseDecreaseInMarginDepositsOutstand.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in money or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivative position.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesAvail.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating, Available-for-sale
InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesAvail.description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on available-for-sale securities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LoanProcessingFee.label: Loan Processing Fee
LoanProcessingFee.description: Expenses paid for obtaining loans which includes expenses such as application and origination fees.

LoansAssumed1.label: Loans Assumed
LoansAssumed1.description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LoansPledgedAsCollateral.label: Loans Pledged as Collateral
LoansPledgedAsCollateral.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans that have been pledged as collateral for borrowings. If the secured party has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral, then the debtor reclassifies that asset and report that asset in its statement of financial position separately from other assets not so encumbered.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

ManagementFeePayable.label: Management Fee Payable
ManagementFeePayable.description: Carrying amount of the unpaid portion of the fee payable to the managing member or general partner for management of the fund or trust.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Redemptions or Purchase of Interests
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest (for example, but not limited to, redeeming or purchasing the interests of noncontrolling shareholders, issuance of shares (interests) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to the parent entity for other than cash, and a buyback of shares (interest) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary from the noncontrolling interests).

MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1.label: Mortgage Loan Related to Property Sales
MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1.description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate
MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.description: Amount of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Carrying Amount of Mortgages (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.description: The carrying amount of the outstanding balance due under the mortgage loan.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Commercial and Consumer, Net
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCostOfMortgages.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Cost of Mortgage Sold
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCostOfMortgages.description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from sale.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFederalIncomeTa.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFederalIncomeTa.description: Amount of the federal income tax basis of mortgage loans on real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNewMortgageLoan.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, New Mortgage Loan
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNewMortgageLoan.description: Amount of increase in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from new investment.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Number of Loans
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.description: Indicates the number of mortgages under each classification.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateOtherAdditions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Other Addition
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateOtherAdditions.description: Amount of addition to investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, classified as other.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodIncreaseD.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Period Increase (Decrease)
MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodIncreaseD.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodicPayment.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Periodic Payment Terms, Balloon Payment to be Received
MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodicPayment.description: Amount of large payment to be received at final maturity date of mortgage loans.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePrincipalAmount.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Principal Amount of Delinquent Loans
MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePrincipalAmount.description: Amount of principal due on loans that have been delinquent, which may exclude loans having interest delinquent for three months or less, as of the balance sheet date.

MortgagesHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.label: Mortgages Held-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
MortgagesHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of mortgage loans held-for-sale.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Cumulative Effect of Change on Equity or Net Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.description: Amount of cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle or new accounting pronouncement on retained earnings or other components of equity or net assets in the statement of financial position as of the beginning of the earliest period presented.

NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDecons.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Deconsolidation
NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDecons.description: The amount of the reduction or elimination during the period of a noncontrolling interest resulting from the parent's loss of control and deconsolidation of the entity in which one or more outside parties had a noncontrolling interest.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfRealEstateProperties.label: Number of Real Estate Properties
NumberOfRealEstateProperties.description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OtherCommitment.label: Other Commitment
OtherCommitment.description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

PaidInKindInterest.label: Paid-in-Kind Interest
PaidInKindInterest.description: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.label: Payments for Advance to Affiliate
PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.description: The cash outflow from advancing money to an affiliate (an entity that is related but not strictly controlled by the entity).

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Productive Assets
PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableConvert.label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableConvert.description: The cash outflow to reacquire callable preferred stock which is identified as being convertible to another type of financial security.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableNoncont.label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableNoncont.description: The cash outflow during the period for redemption of redeemable noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities, because they are not classified as trading securities.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Held-for-sale Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Other Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireOtherProductiveAssets.description: Amount of cash outflow for the purchase of or improvements to tangible or intangible assets, used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireResidentialRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Residential Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireResidentialRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of residential property intended to generate income for the owner.

PaymentsToPurchaseMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Payments to Purchase Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsToPurchaseMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans that are secured with real estate mortgage and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffilia.label: Proceeds from Collection of Advance to Affiliate
ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffilia.description: The cash inflow from the collection of money previously advanced to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStockDividen.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStockDividen.description: Amount of cash inflow from capital contributions to an entity associated with a dividend reinvestment plan.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections
ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.

ProceedsFromLoans.label: Proceeds from Loans
ProceedsFromLoans.description: Cash received from principal payments made on loans related to operating activities.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Investments
ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings.label: Proceeds from Sale of Buildings
ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings.description: The cash inflow from sale of buildings.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The cash inflow from sales of loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Secured Notes Payable
ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForOtherLosses.label: Provision for Other Losses
ProvisionForOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related to other loss.

RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.label: Real Estate Acquired Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowance.label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance
RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowance.description: For each period for which an income statement is required, disclosure of the changes in the allowance, including balances at end of period.

RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceCompone.label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Component
RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceCompone.description: The valuation allowance loss on real estate owned or any impairment losses taken against real estate investments held for use or resale.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RentalProperties.label: Rental Properties
RentalProperties.description: Carrying amount of income producing properties held for rental.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.label: Revenues, Net of Interest Expense
RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecuredDebtOther.label: Secured Debt, Other
SecuredDebtOther.description: Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements.label: Secured Debt, Repurchase Agreements
SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements.description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of securities sold under agreements to repurchase where the transferor maintains effective control over the assets, accounting for them as secured debt.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).
